title: Filling up vacancies essential for improving access to justice, says CJI Ramana - The Indian Express
content:
1. Filling up vacancies essential for improving access to justice, says CJI Ramana  The Indian Express
  2. You Will Soon Get A Good News : CJI Ramana To Judicial Officers On Pay Commission Issues  Live Law - Indian Legal News
  3. CJI NV Ramana urges trial court judges to return to physical hearings to clear backlogs  India Today
  4. 'After Oath, it is Only the Constitution That Guides Us': CJI Ramana  The Wire
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Justice Ramana says the requirements of the Criminal Procedure Code are not mere formalities but ‘an important check on executive actions and represent substantive rights of the accused’, and that judges must consider litigants’ socio-economic backgrounds, language, education etc.
